home.shortMsg: I build fast and responsive websites with Wordpress and React

aboutMe.title: Want to know more about me?
aboutMe.content: This is where you can find information about me and what I do. I write about the things I like and the tools I use at work or in my day-to-day basis.

portfolio.title: Discover my Portfolio
portfolio.content: Since I have wrote my first line of code, I have created lots of different websites, applications, projects and so forth. You can find a list of all of them over there.

resume.title: Access my resume
resume.content: You can have a look at the live version of my resume. Although it is possible to download a PDF version of it, whatever suits you!

contact.title: Let's keep in touch
contact.content: If you want to hire me, tell me about a mispelling mistake I have made, giving me your feedback, or just say "G'day! ", please feel free to send me a message! There is a form, but I am also active on social medias
